analysis.key_quote: I oppose proposed rule Docket ID OPM-2025-0004. Quite clearly, it is a further effort of the Trump administration to kneecap a professional, expert, civil service and replace it with subservient MAGA sycophants.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule and highlights concerns about the politicization of the civil service, as well as the undermining of professional integrity and merit-based systems.
